Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.0001
! const values for parameter: Wall Contour Line - iWallContourLine WALL_CONTOUR_OFF = 1 WALL_CONTOUR_INSIDE = 2 WALL_CONTOUR_OUTSIDE = 3 WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES = 4
! const values for parameter: iClosureType: CLOSURE_NO = 0 CLOSURE_TRADITIONAL = 1 CLOSURE_PREFABRICATED = 2 CLOSURE_CUSTOM = 3 CLOSURE_SOLID_WALL = 4 CLOSURE_STUD_WALL = 5 CLOSURE_STUD_WALL_SIDING = 6 CLOSURE_BRICK_VENEER = 7 CLOSURE_VARIABLE = 8 CLOSURE_PLASTER_REVEAL = 9 CLOSURE_INSULATED_REVEAL = 10 CLOSURE_INSULATED_FOR_RENOVATION = 11 CLOSURE_FINISH = 12 CLOSURE_AIR_SPACE = 13 CLOSURE_DUTCH_VARIABLE = 14
! const values for parameter: iSillType SILL_TIMBER = 1 SILL_BRICK = 2 SILL_STONE = 3 SILL_CERAMIC = 4 SILL_ETHERNIT = 5 SILL_CONCRETE_TUB = 6 SILL_ALUMINIUM = 7 SILL_SOLID_11 = 8 SILL_SOLID_12 = 9 SILL_SOLID_22 = 10 SILL_METAL_1 = 11 SILL_PARALLEL = 12 SILL_METAL_2 = 13 SILL_PARALLEL_2 = 14 SILL_SIMPLEBLOCK = 15 SILL_BLOCK = 16 SILL_DUTCH = 17
! const values for parameter: gs_sunShade_iType
SUNSHADE_DECORATIVE = 1 SUNSHADE_SHUTTER = 2 SUNSHADE_FOLDING = 3 SUNSHADE_OUTFOLDING = 4 SUNSHADE_SLIDING = 5 SUNSHADE_ROLLING = 6 SUNSHADE_EXTVENETIAN = 7 SUNSHADE_VENETIAN = 8
! iWindowShape: SHAPE_RECTANGULAR = 0 SHAPE_ARCHED = 1 SHAPE_ROUND = 2 SHAPE_EYEBROWS = 3 SHAPE_HALFCIRCLE = 4 ! straight side is horizontal SHAPE_MULTISIDE = 5 SHAPE_OCTAGONAL = 6 SHAPE_HALFARCH = 7 SHAPE_PENTAGON = 8 SHAPE_QUARTERROUND = 9 SHAPE_HALFROUND = 10 ! straight side is vertical SHAPE_TRAPEZOID = 11 SHAPE_TRIANGLE = 12 SHAPE_GOTHICARCH = 13 SHAPE_ELLIPSEARCH = 14 SHAPE_ROMBUS = 15 SHAPE_HORSESHOE = 16 SHAPE_OGEECENTERED = 17 SHAPE_SARACENIC = 18 SHAPE_T = 19 SHAPE_HALF_T_LEFT = 20 SHAPE_ARCHED_T = 21 SHAPE_ARCHED_HALF_T_LEFT = 22 SHAPE_PARALLELOGRAM = 23 SHAPE_ELLIPSE = 24 SHAPE_CORNER_TRIANGLE = 25 SHAPE_QUARTERROUND_NOFRAME = 26 SHAPE_HALF_T_RIGHT = 27 SHAPE_ARCHED_HALF_T_RIGHT = 28
! gs_leaf_optype_m: LEAF_1L_SIDE_HUNG = 1 LEAF_1L_SIDE_HUNG_M = 2 LEAF_1L_DOUBLE_ACTING = 3 LEAF_1L_DOUBLE_ACTING_M = 4 LEAF_2L_SIDE_HUNG = 5 LEAF_2L_DOUBLE_ACTING = 6 LEAF_2L_DOUBLE_EGRESS = 7 LEAF_2L_DOUBLE_EGRESS_M = 8 LEAF_1L_PIVOT = 9 LEAF_1L_PIVOT_M = 10 LEAF_2L_1SLIDING = 11 LEAF_2L_1SLIDING_M = 12 LEAF_2L_2SLIDING = 13 LEAF_2L_2SLIDING_M = 14 LEAF_3L_2SLIDING = 15 LEAF_3L_2SLIDING_M = 16 LEAF_4L_2SLIDING = 17 LEAF_4L_3SLIDING = 18 LEAF_4L_3SLIDING_M = 19 LEAF_4L_4SLIDING = 20 LEAF_4L_4SLIDING_M = 21 LEAF_1L_EXTERNAL_SLIDING = 22 LEAF_1L_EXTERNAL_SLIDING_M = 23 LEAF_2L_EXTERNAL_SLIDING = 24 LEAF_1L_POCKET = 25 LEAF_1L_POCKET_M = 26 LEAF_2L_POCKET = 27 LEAF_1L_MULTIPANEL = 28 LEAF_1L_MULTIPANEL_M = 29 LEAF_2L_MULTIPANEL = 30 LEAF_REVOLVING = 31 LEAF_3L_2SLIDING_CENTER = 32 LEAF_GAR_1L_UP_AND_OVER = 100 LEAF_GAR_1L_UP_SLIDING = 101 LEAF_GAR_1L_SECTIONAL = 102 LEAF_GAR_2L_SIDE_HUNG = 103 LEAF_GAR_2L_ROLLSIDE = 104 LEAF_GAR_1L_ROLLUP = 105
! const values for parameter: iTypeDemolitionFill RENOVATION_FILL_EXIST = 1 RENOVATION_FILL_DEMOLISHED = 2 RENOVATION_FILL_NEW = 3 RENOVATION_FILL_NEW_FULL = 4
bCompositeWall = (WALL_SKINS_NUMBER > 0)
if bEnableCasing then call "CasingEnable" parameters iRevealType = iRevealType, iWindowShape = iWindowShape, gs_frame_style_m = gs_frame_style_m, returned_parameters bInsideCasingNotAvailableByWallType, bInsideCasingNotAvailableByReveal, bOutsideCasingNotAvailableByReveal, bInsideCasingNotAvailableByFrameStyle, bOutsideCasingNotAvailableByFrameStyle endif
if bEnableVentilationProfile then call "ventilation_paramhandling_m" parameters isWindow = isWindow, iWindowType = iWindowType, gs_bLeftSLight = gs_bLeftSLight, gs_bSLight = gs_bSLight, gs_UTrans = gs_UTrans, gs_UTrans_Div = gs_UTrans_Div, gs_LTrans = gs_LTrans, gs_LTrans_Div = gs_LTrans_Div, iUTrans = iUTrans, gs_panes_number = gs_panes_number, CasementIDArray = CasementIDArray, bVentilationProfile = bVentilationProfile, iVentilationProfileType = iVentilationProfileType, isVentilationProfileInSash_01 = isVentilationProfileInSash_01, isVentilationProfileInSash_02 = isVentilationProfileInSash_02, isVentilationProfileInSash_03 = isVentilationProfileInSash_03, isVentilationProfileInSash_04 = isVentilationProfileInSash_04, isVentilationProfileInSash_05 = isVentilationProfileInSash_05, isVentilationProfileInSash_06 = isVentilationProfileInSash_06, isVentilationProfileInSash_07 = isVentilationProfileInSash_07, isVentilationProfileInSash_08 = isVentilationProfileInSash_08, isVentilationProfileInSash_09 = isVentilationProfileInSash_09, isVentilationProfileInSash_10 = isVentilationProfileInSash_10, isVentilationProfileInSash_11 = isVentilationProfileInSash_11, iMullionStyle_01 = iMullionStyle_01, iMullionStyle_02 = iMullionStyle_02, iMullionStyle_03 = iMullionStyle_03, iMullionStyle_04 = iMullionStyle_04, iMullionStyle_05 = iMullionStyle_05, iMullionStyle_06 = iMullionStyle_06, iMullionStyle_07 = iMullionStyle_07, iMullionStyle_08 = iMullionStyle_08, iMullionStyle_09 = iMullionStyle_09, iMullionStyle_10 = iMullionStyle_10, iMullionStyle_11 = iMullionStyle_11, returned_parameters bFoundVentilationProfile, dummy, dummy endif
bShowFrameParameters = (gs_leaf_optype_m <> LEAF_1L_EXTERNAL_SLIDING & gs_leaf_optype_m <> LEAF_1L_EXTERNAL_SLIDING_M & gs_leaf_optype_m <> LEAF_2L_EXTERNAL_SLIDING)
Symbol.Script_UI:
! ============================================================================= ! Localization ! =============================================================================
st2DDetailLevel = `2D-детализация` stUseFills = `Использовать Штриховки`
stWallContourLines = `Линии Контура Стены` stDoorWallContourLines = `Линии Контуров Проема в Стене` stSidelightWallContourLines = `Линии Контуров Стен Боковой Панели` stLineTypeInside = `Тип Линии Внутри` stLineTypeOutside = `Тип Линии Снаружи` stVisibleLineTypeInside = `Тип Линии Видимого Контура Внутри` stVisibleLineTypeOutside = `Тип Линии Видимого Контура Снаружи` stHiddenLineTypeInside = `Тип Линии Невидимого Контура Внутри` stHiddenLineTypeOutside = `Тип Линии Невидимого Контура Снаружи` stLinePen = `Перо Линии`
stPlanSymbolFillType = `Тип Штриховки Символа Плана` stPlanSymbolFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Символа Плана` stPlanSymbolFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Символа Плана` stDoorPlanSymbolFillType = `Тип Штриховки Символа Двери на Плане` stDoorPlanSymbolFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Символа Двери на Плане` stDoorPlanSymbolFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Символа Двери на Плане` stSidelightPlanSymbolFillType = `Тип Штриховки Символа Боковой Панели на Плане` stSidelightPlanSymbolFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Символа Боковой Панели на Плане` stSidelightPlanSymbolFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Символа Боковой Панели на Плане`
stDoor = `Дверь` stFrameContourPen = `Перо Контура Коробки` stLeafContourPen = `Перо Контура Полотна` stGlassContourPen = `Перо Контура Остекления` stMullionContourPen = `Перо Контура Раскладки` stLeafSashContourPen = `Перо Контура Створок и Полотна` stUncutFillType = `Тип Штриховки Видимых Поверхностей` stUncutFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Видимых Поверхностей` stUncutFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Видимых Поверхностей` stFrameCutFillType = `Тип Штриховки Сечения Коробки` stFrameCutFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Сечения Коробки` stFrameCutFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Сечения Коробки` stLeafCutFillType = `Тип Штриховки Сечения Полотна` stLeafCutFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Сечения Полотна` stLeafCutFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Сечения Полотна` stLeafSashCutFillType = `Тип Штриховки Сечения Створки и Полотна` stLeafSashCutFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Сечения Створки и Полотна` stLeafSashCutFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Сечения Створки и Полотна` stGlassCutFillType = `Тип Штриховки Сечения Остекления` stGlassCutFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Сечения Остекления` stGlassCutFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Сечения Остекления`
stWindow = `Окно` stCutLinePen = `Перо Линии Сечения` stUncutLinePen = `Перо Линии Видимого Контура` st3DSectUncutLinePen = `Перо Линий Видимого Контура в 3D/Сечении` stSashCutFillType = `Тип Штриховки Сечения Створки` stSashCutFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Сечения Створки` stSashCutFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Сечения Створки`
stOpeningLinesOverride = `Замена Линий Открывания` stLineTypeOnDoorLeaf = `Тип Линии Полотна Двери`
if not(bDisable2DOverride) & not(bDisable3DOverride) then stPen = `Перо в 2D/Сечении` stPenOnDoorLeaf = `Перо Полотна Двери в 2D/Сечении` else if not(bDisable3DOverride) then stPen = `Перо Сечения` stPenOnDoorLeaf = `Перо Полотна Двери в Сечении` endif endif stPenOnSidelightTransom = `Перо Сечения Боковой Панели/Фрамуги`
stWallClosure = `Замыкание Слоев` stContourLineType = `Тип Линии Контура` stContourPen = `Перо Контура` stFillType = `Тип Штриховки` stFillPen = `Перо Штриховки` stFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки`
stWallInset = `Подоконная Ниша` stShowHiddenParapetOn2D = `Показ Подоконной Ниши в 2D` stHiddenParapetLineType = `Тип Линии Невидимого Контура Ниши`
stMasonryArch = `Декоративная Перемычка` stSectionPen = `Перо Сечения` stSectionFillType = `Тип Штриховки Сечения` stSectionFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Сечения` stSectionFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Сечения`
stThreshold = `Порог` stLineType = `Тип Линии`
stCasing = `Наличник` stCutLinePenOnBothSides = `Перо Линии Сечения с Обеих Сторон` stOutsideSectionFillType = `Тип Штриховки Сечения Снаружи` stOutsideSectionFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Сечения Снаружи` stOutsideSectionFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Сечения Снаружи` stInsideSectionFillType = `Тип Штриховки Сечения Внутри` stInsideSectionFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Сечения Внутри` stInsideSectionFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Сечения Внутри`
stSill = `Отлив` stSectionInsulationContourPen = `Перо Контура Сечения Изоляции` stSectionInsulationFillType = `Тип Штриховки Сечения Изоляции` stSectionInsulationFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Сечения Изоляции` stSectionInsulationFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Сечения Изоляции`
stBoard = `Доска`
stVentilationProfile = `Приточный Клапан`
stSunshade = `Ставни` stShowOpeningLines = `Показ Линий Открывания` stCutFillType = `Тип Штриховки Сечения` stCutFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Сечения` stCutFillBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Штриховки Сечения` stInsulationFillType = `Тип Штриховки Изоляции` stInsulationFillPen = `Перо Штриховки Изоляции` stInsulationBackgroundPen = `Перо Фона Изоляции`
startItemID_IndependParams = 1 startItemID_DemolitionNew = 90 startItemID_WallContour = 100 startItemID_OpeningGanging = 150 startItemID_UseFills = 160 startItemID_FrameSash = 200 startItemID_OpeningLines = 300 startItemID_WallClosure = 400 startItemID_WallInset = 500 startItemID_MasonryArch = 600 startItemID_Threshold = 700 startItemID_Casing = 800 startItemID_Sill = 900 startItemID_Board = 1000 startItemID_Ventilation = 1100 startItemID_Sunshade = 1200 startItemID_OpeningHeadSymb = 1300 startItemID_Opening2DArc = 1310
! ============================================================================= ! Built-In Floor Plan and Section ! =============================================================================
pageStartY = 0
ui_listfield listFieldID, 0, pageStartY, 444, 265
itemID = startItemID_IndependParams
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "iDWDet2D", 0, "", st2DDetailLevel : itemID = itemID + 1
! itemID = 2 reserved to iRevealOnSymbol, see in Functions macros itemID = itemID + 1
if iWindowType = 43 then ! WIN_MultisashVertical ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_ShowSashOnSymbol", 0, "", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif
! ============================================================================= ! Demolition / New construction SWE only ! ============================================================================= itemID = startItemID_DemolitionNew
if gs_bShowDemolitionPar then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "iTypeDemolitionFill", 0, "", "" : itemID = itemID + 1
if iTypeDemolitionFill = RENOVATION_FILL_NEW |\ iTypeDemolitionFill = RENOVATION_FILL_NEW_FULL then
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_new_symb_fill", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_new_symb_pen_Fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_new_symb_pen_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_new_symb_width_r", 1, "", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_new_symb_width_l", 1, "", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 5 endif
if iTypeDemolitionFill = RENOVATION_FILL_DEMOLISHED & bShowDemolitionLineType then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_Demolition_linetype", 1, "ui_list_pencolor_flat(1)", `Тип Линии` endif itemID = itemID + 1 endif
! ============================================================================= ! Wall Contour Lines ! =============================================================================
bShowSidelightAttributes = (not(isWindow) & bDoorWithSidelightSupport & ((gs_sidelight_left & gs_sidelight_parapet_hgt_left > EPS) |\ (gs_sidelight_right & gs_sidelight_parapet_hgt_right > EPS)))
itemID = startItemID_WallContour
if bShowSidelightAttributes then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", stWallContourLines : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_line", 1, "", stDoorWallContourLines : itemID = itemID + 1 if iWallContourLine <> WALL_CONTOUR_OFF then if iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_OUTSIDE | iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_line_out", 1, "ui_list_visibleLineOut_flat(1)", stVisibleLineTypeOutside endif itemID = itemID + 1 if iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_INSIDE | iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_line_in", 1, "ui_list_visibleLineIn_flat(1)", stVisibleLineTypeInside endif itemID = itemID + 1 if iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_OUTSIDE | iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_hidden_line_out", 1, "ui_list_hiddenLineOut_flat(1)", stHiddenLineTypeOutside endif itemID = itemID + 1 if iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_INSIDE | iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_hidden_line_in", 1, "ui_list_hiddenLineIn_flat(1)", stHiddenLineTypeInside endif itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 4 endif
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_line_sl", 1, "", stSidelightWallContourLines : itemID = itemID + 1 if iWallContourLineSl <> WALL_CONTOUR_OFF then if iWallContourLineSl = WALL_CONTOUR_OUTSIDE | iWallContourLineSl = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_line_sl_out", 1, "ui_list_visibleLineOut_flat(1)", stVisibleLineTypeOutside endif itemID = itemID + 1 if iWallContourLineSl = WALL_CONTOUR_INSIDE | iWallContourLineSl = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_line_sl_in", 1, "ui_list_visibleLineIn_flat(1)", stVisibleLineTypeInside endif itemID = itemID + 1 if iWallContourLineSl = WALL_CONTOUR_OUTSIDE | iWallContourLineSl = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_hidden_line_sl_out", 1, "ui_list_hiddenLineOut_flat(1)", stHiddenLineTypeOutside endif itemID = itemID + 1 if iWallContourLineSl = WALL_CONTOUR_INSIDE | iWallContourLineSl = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_hidden_line_sl_in", 1, "ui_list_hiddenLineIn_flat(1)", stHiddenLineTypeInside endif itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 4 endif if iWallContourLine <> WALL_CONTOUR_OFF | iWallContourLineSl <> WALL_CONTOUR_OFF then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_line_pen", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stLinePen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 1 endif else ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_line", 0, "", stWallContourLines : itemID = itemID + 1 if iWallContourLine <> WALL_CONTOUR_OFF then if not(bEnableSill | bEnableThreshold) then if not(bEnableThreshold | bEnableBoard) then stVisibleLineTypeOutside = stLineTypeOutside endif endif if not(bEnableThreshold | bEnableBoard) then if not(bEnableSill | bEnableThreshold) then stVisibleLineTypeInside = stLineTypeInside endif endif
if iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_OUTSIDE | iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_line_out", 1, "ui_list_visibleLineOut_flat(1)", stVisibleLineTypeOutside endif itemID = itemID + 1 if iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_INSIDE | iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_line_in", 1, "ui_list_visibleLineIn_flat(1)", stVisibleLineTypeInside endif itemID = itemID + 1 if (bEnableSill | bEnableThreshold) & (iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_OUTSIDE | iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES) then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_hidden_line_out", 1, "ui_list_hiddenLineOut_flat(1)", stHiddenLineTypeOutside : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 1 endif if (bEnableThreshold | bEnableBoard) & (iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_INSIDE | iWallContourLine = WALL_CONTOUR_BOTHSIDES) then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_hidden_line_in", 1, "ui_list_hiddenLineIn_flat(1)", stHiddenLineTypeInside : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 1 endif ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wcont_line_pen", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stLinePen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 5 endif itemID = itemID + 6 endif
! ============================================================================= ! Ganging for Empty Openings ! ============================================================================= if isEmptyOpening then itemID = startItemID_OpeningGanging ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", `Стыковка` : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_stack_left_contour", 1, "ui_list_wallContSide1_flat(1)", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_stack_right_contour", 1, "ui_list_wallContSide2_flat(1)", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif
! ============================================================================= ! Use Fills group ! ============================================================================= itemID = startItemID_UseFills ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_bFills", 0, "", stUseFills : itemID = itemID + 1
if bShowSidelightAttributes then if gs_bFills then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wallhole_fill", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stDoorPlanSymbolFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wallhole_pen_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stDoorPlanSymbolFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wallhole_pen_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stDoorPlanSymbolFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wallhole_fill_sl", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stSidelightPlanSymbolFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wallhole_pen_sl_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stSidelightPlanSymbolFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wallhole_pen_sl_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stSidelightPlanSymbolFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 endif else if gs_bFills then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wallhole_fill", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stPlanSymbolFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wallhole_pen_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stPlanSymbolFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_wallhole_pen_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stPlanSymbolFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Frame and Sash Attributes ! =============================================================================
if not(isEmptyOpening) then itemID = startItemID_FrameSash
if isWindow then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", stWindow : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_frame_pen_cont", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stCutLinePen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_pen_2D", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stUncutLinePen : itemID = itemID + 1
if bStorefrontClassic then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_pen_glass", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stGlassContourPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_pen_mull", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stMullionContourPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 2 endif
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_fillShCover", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stUncutFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penShCov_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stUncutFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penShCov_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stUncutFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1

if iWindowType = 44 then ! call "casement_paramhandling_m" parameters iWindowType = iWindowType, gs_bLeftSLight = gs_bLeftSLight, gs_bSLight = gs_bSLight, gs_UTrans = gs_UTrans, gs_UTrans_Div = gs_UTrans_Div, gs_LTrans = gs_LTrans, gs_LTrans_Div = gs_LTrans_Div, gs_sash_uniform = gs_sash_uniform, gs_panes_number = gs_panes_number, CasementIDArray = CasementIDArray, iMullionStyle_00 = iMullionStyle_00, iMullionStyle_01 = iMullionStyle_01, iMullionStyle_02 = iMullionStyle_02, iMullionStyle_03 = iMullionStyle_03, iMullionStyle_04 = iMullionStyle_04, iMullionStyle_05 = iMullionStyle_05, iMullionStyle_06 = iMullionStyle_06, iMullionStyle_07 = iMullionStyle_07, iMullionStyle_08 = iMullionStyle_08, iMullionStyle_09 = iMullionStyle_09, iMullionStyle_10 = iMullionStyle_10, iMullionStyle_11 = iMullionStyle_11, gs_optype_m_01 = gs_optype_m_01, gs_optype_m_02 = gs_optype_m_02, gs_optype_m_03 = gs_optype_m_03, gs_optype_m_04 = gs_optype_m_04, gs_optype_m_05 = gs_optype_m_05, gs_optype_m_06 = gs_optype_m_06, gs_optype_m_07 = gs_optype_m_07, gs_optype_m_08 = gs_optype_m_08, gs_optype_m_09 = gs_optype_m_09, gs_optype_m_10 = gs_optype_m_10, gs_optype_m_11 = gs_optype_m_11, returned_parameters dummy, dummy, dummy, dummy, dummy, dummy, dummy, dummy, bHideSashAttr
if not(bHideSashAttr) then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_fillSash", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stSashCutFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penSash_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stSashCutFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penSash_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stSashCutFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 3 endif if bStorefrontClassic then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_gsect", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stGlassCutFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penGlass_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stGlassCutFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penGlass_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stGlassCutFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 3 endif else itemID = itemID + 9 endif else ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", stDoor : itemID = itemID + 1
if bShowFrameParameters then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_frame_pen_cont", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stFrameContourPen endif itemID = itemID + 1
if bShowSidelightAttributes then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_leaf_pen_2D", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stLeafSashContourPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_leaf_pen_2D", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stLeafContourPen : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bStorefrontClassic then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_pen_glass", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stGlassContourPen : itemID = itemID + 1 endif
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_FillSdl", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stUncutFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penSdl_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stUncutFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penSdl_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stUncutFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1
if gs_bFills then if bShowFrameParameters then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_fillFr", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stFrameCutFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penFr_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stFrameCutFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penFr_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stFrameCutFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 3 endif
if bShowSidelightAttributes then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_fillLeaf", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stLeafSashCutFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penLeaf_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stLeafSashCutFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penLeaf_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stLeafSashCutFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_fillLeaf", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stLeafCutFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penLeaf_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stLeafCutFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penLeaf_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stLeafCutFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bStorefrontClassic | bShowGlassSectionPars then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_gsect", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stGlassCutFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penGlass_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stGlassCutFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penGlass_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stGlassCutFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 3 endif else itemID = itemID + 9 endif endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Opening Lines Override ! =============================================================================
itemID = startItemID_OpeningLines if not(bDisable2DOverride) then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "bOverride_MVO_2D", 0, "", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 else if not(bDisable3DOverride) then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "bOverride_MVO_3D", 0, "", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif endif if isWindow then if bOverride_MVO_2D then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "or_swingLineType", 1, "ui_list_dw_OpLineType_flat(1)", stLineType endif itemID = itemID + 1
if bOverride_MVO_2D | bOverride_MVO_3D then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "or_opLinePen", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stPen endif itemID = itemID + 1 else if bOverride_MVO_2D then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "or_swingLineType", 1, "ui_list_dw_OpLineType_flat(1)", stLineTypeOnDoorLeaf : itemID = itemID + 1 endif itemID = itemID + 1
if bOverride_MVO_2D | bOverride_MVO_3D then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "or_opLinePen", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stPenOnDoorLeaf endif itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bDoorWithSidelightSupport & not(bDisable3DOverride) then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "bOverride_MVO_win_3D", 0, "", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 if bOverride_MVO_win_3D then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "or_winOpLinePen", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stPenOnSidelightTransom : itemID = itemID + 1 endif else itemID = itemID + 1 endif
! ============================================================================= ! Wall Closure ! =============================================================================
if ((iClosureType = CLOSURE_TRADITIONAL & gs_bJoint) |\ iClosureType = CLOSURE_PREFABRICATED |\ iClosureType = CLOSURE_AIR_SPACE |\ (iClosureType = CLOSURE_FINISH & gs_bJoint) |\ iClosureType = CLOSURE_VARIABLE |\ iClosureType = CLOSURE_DUTCH_VARIABLE) then
itemID = startItemID_WallClosure
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", stWallClosure : itemID = itemID + 1 if iClosureType = CLOSURE_PREFABRICATED | iClosureType = CLOSURE_AIR_SPACE then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_ltPlug", 1, "ui_list_contLineType_flat(1)", stContourLineType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penPlug", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stContourPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_fillPlug", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penPlugFg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penPlugBg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_ltJoint", 1, "ui_list_contLineType_flat(1)", stContourLineType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penJoint", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stContourPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_fillJoint", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penJointFg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_penJointBg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Wall Inset ! =============================================================================
if bEnableParapetInset & isWindow then itemID = startItemID_WallInset
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", stWallInset : itemID = itemID + 1 if gs_parapet_wall_inset then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_parapet_2D", 1, "", stShowHiddenParapetOn2D : itemID = itemID + 1 if gs_parapet_2D then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_parapet_line", 1, "", stHiddenParapetLineType : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 1 endif else itemID = itemID + 2 endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Masonry Arch ! =============================================================================
if bEnableMasonryArch & not(gs_stack_top) then itemID = startItemID_MasonryArch
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", stMasonryArch : itemID = itemID + 1 if bMasonryArch then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_masonry_arch_pen", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stSectionPen : itemID = itemID + 1 if gs_bFills then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_masonry_arch_fill", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stSectionFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_masonry_arch_pen_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stSectionFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_masonry_arch_pen_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stSectionFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 3 endif else itemID = itemID + 4 endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Threshold ! =============================================================================
if bEnableThreshold then itemID = startItemID_Threshold
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", stThreshold : itemID = itemID + 1 if bThreshold then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_pen_2D", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stContourPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sillTreshold_lineType", 1, "ui_list_contLineType_flat(1)", stLineType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_treshold_pen_sectcont", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stSectionPen : itemID = itemID + 1 if gs_bFills then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_treshold_fill", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stSectionFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_treshold_pen_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stSectionFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_treshold_pen_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stSectionFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 3 endif else itemID = itemID + 6 endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Casing ! =============================================================================
if bEnableCasing then itemID = startItemID_Casing
_bShowOutsideCasingParams = gs_trim_outside & not(bOutsideCasingNotAvailableByReveal | bOutsideCasingNotAvailableByFrameStyle) _bShowInsideCasingParams = gs_trim_inside & not(bInsideCasingNotAvailableByWallType | bInsideCasingNotAvailableByReveal | bInsideCasingNotAvailableByFrameStyle)
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", stCasing : itemID = itemID + 1 if (_bShowOutsideCasingParams | _bShowInsideCasingParams) then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_trim_pen_cont", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stCutLinePenOnBothSides : itemID = itemID + 1 if gs_bFills & gs_trim_outside then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_trim_fill_out", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stOutsideSectionFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_trim_pen_fg_out", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stOutsideSectionFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_trim_pen_bg_out", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stOutsideSectionFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 3 endif if gs_bFills & gs_trim_inside then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_trim_fill_in", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stInsideSectionFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_trim_pen_fg_in", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stInsideSectionFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_trim_pen_bg_in", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stInsideSectionFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 3 endif else itemID = itemID + 8 endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Sill ! =============================================================================
if bEnableSill then itemID = startItemID_Sill
if bDoorWithSidelightSupport then _bHasAnySillOn = (gs_sill_outside | \ (gs_sidelight_left & gs_sidelight_parapet_hgt_left > EPS & gs_sill_outside_sl_left) | \ (gs_sidelight_right & gs_sidelight_parapet_hgt_right > EPS & gs_sill_outside_sl_right)) else _bHasAnySillOn = (gs_sill_outside) endif
if not(gs_stack_bottom) then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", stSill : itemID = itemID + 1
if _bHasAnySillOn then if not(isWindow) then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_pen_2D", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stContourPen : itemID = itemID + 1 endif ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sill_pen_sectcont", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stSectionPen : itemID = itemID + 1 if gs_bFills then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sill_fill", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stSectionFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sill_pen_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stSectionFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sill_pen_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stSectionFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 3 endif
if iSillType = SILL_TIMBER |\ iSillType = SILL_SOLID_11 |\ iSillType = SILL_SOLID_12 |\ iSillType = SILL_SOLID_22 |\ iSillType = SILL_PARALLEL |\ (iSillType = SILL_PARALLEL_2 & gs_sill_ins_below & not(gs_sill_ins_use_wall_skin & bCompositeWall)) |\ iSillType = SILL_METAL_2 then
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sill_pen_ins_sectcont", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stSectionInsulationContourPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sill_fill_ins_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stSectionInsulationFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sill_pen_ins_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stSectionInsulationFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sill_pen_ins_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stSectionInsulationFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 4 endif else itemID = itemID + 8 endif else itemID = itemID + 9 endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Board ! =============================================================================
if bEnableBoard & not(gs_stack_bottom) then itemID = startItemID_Board
if bDoorWithSidelightSupport then _bHasAnyBoardOn = (gs_board_inside | \ (gs_sidelight_left & gs_sidelight_parapet_hgt_left > EPS & gs_board_inside_sl_left) | \ (gs_sidelight_right & gs_sidelight_parapet_hgt_right > EPS & gs_board_inside_sl_right)) else _bHasAnyBoardOn = (gs_board_inside) endif
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", stBoard : itemID = itemID + 1 if _bHasAnyBoardOn then if not(isWindow) then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_pen_2D", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stContourPen : itemID = itemID + 1 endif ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_board_pen_sectcont", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stSectionPen : itemID = itemID + 1 if gs_bFills then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_board_fill", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stSectionFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_board_pen_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stSectionFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_board_pen_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stSectionFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 3 endif else itemID = itemID + 4 endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Ventilation Profile ! =============================================================================
if bEnableVentilationProfile then itemID = startItemID_Ventilation
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", stVentilationProfile : itemID = itemID + 1 if bVentilationProfile then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_ventProfile_fill", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stSectionFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_ventProfile_pen_fg", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stSectionFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_ventProfile_pen_bg", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stSectionFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Sunshade ! =============================================================================
if bEnableShutter then itemID = startItemID_Sunshade
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "", 0, "", stSunshade : itemID = itemID + 1 if bSunshade then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sunShade_lineType", 1, "ui_list_contLineType_flat(1)", stLineType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sunShade_bShowOpline", 1, "", stShowOpeningLines : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sunShade_cutLinesPen", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", stCutLinePen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sunShade_unCutLinesPen", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", st3DSectUncutLinePen : itemID = itemID + 1 if gs_bFills then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sunShade_cutFillType", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stCutFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sunShade_cutFillPen", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stCutFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sunShade_cutFillBackPen", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stCutFillBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 3 endif if (gs_sunShade_iType = SUNSHADE_ROLLING | gs_sunShade_iType = SUNSHADE_EXTVENETIAN) then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sunShade_insFillType", 1, "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)", stInsulationFillType : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sunShade_insFillPen", 1, "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)", stInsulationFillPen : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_sunShade_insFillBackPen", 1, "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)", stInsulationBackgroundPen : itemID = itemID + 1 else itemID = itemID + 3 endif endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Opening Head Symbol ! =============================================================================
itemID = startItemID_OpeningHeadSymb if isEmptyOpening then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_head_symbol", 0, "", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 if gs_head_symbol then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_head_symbol_line", 1, "ui_list_contLineType_flat(1)", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_head_symbol_pen", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif endif
itemID = startItemID_Opening2DArc if isEmptyOpening & (iWindowShape <> SHAPE_RECTANGULAR) then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_arc_2D", 0, "", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 if gs_arc_2D then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldID, "gs_brickw_lt", 1, "ui_list_contLineType_flat(1)", "" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif endif
